thread.title: Cleveland Indians' Michael Brantley answers boos with two-run double in minor league game
thread.title_full: Cleveland Indians' Michael Brantley answers boos with two-run double in minor league game

author: Paul Hoynes, cleveland.com
title: Cleveland Indians' Michael Brantley answers boos with two-run double in minor league game
text: Michael Brantley went 1-for-3 with a double and two RBI Wednesday in a minor league game against the Dodgers. Brantley, who continues to make progress with his surgically-repaired right shoulder, will play in another minor league game Friday.
